question: An overseas friend wants to visit your country on holiday. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter Recommend the best time of year to visit and why Describe the types of accommodation your friend could choose Say what you would like to show your friend in your country
text: I am excited to write this letter as I got to know about your's upcoming trip to my place and I cannot wait anymore to meet you. Hence, I would recommend you to come during the winter as this can be the best time to see mesmerizing theme parks and spectacular waterfalls which are going to be very active in mid of winter only. In addition, I have my vacation plan during the same time despite my busy schedule at my workplace.

However, you are going to have a new experience at my place and I am wondering if your's accommodation and other requirements  if any which I do not know yet. Furthermore, we have different types of flats available in which a few are with full furniture and others are with limited items

Having said that, please do not hesitate to let me know your choice and any other specific needs during your stay.Undoubtedly, you are going to have  blown away during the trip and I have prepared our trip throughout the week right from the high-rise buildings to ancestor places which are very special with  phenomenal views.
I look forward to seeing you soon and making this happen with great success  all the way.
